main event: A light was observed in the sky over Fremont, California, on August 10, 1965.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a circumference of about a couple of yards., The light appeared to be grapefruit or orange in color., The sighting lasted approximately 45-50 seconds., The object was estimated to travel at a speed of 500 mph., The object was seen making a turn before disappearing to the west.
